rows.label: qst400207_msg0001
rows.name: Forget about that, did you know this?!

rows.label: qst400207_msg0002
rows.name:
Apparently whenever a new Blade
is born, it has to be registered with
the Holy See of Acedia!

rows.label: qst400207_msg0004
rows.name:
Th...that's very interesting!
You certainly know a lot.

rows.label: qst400207_msg0005
rows.name:
Yeah, so I bet that guy who just got
scouted to be a Driver will have to
go there sooner or later.

rows.label: qst400207_msg0006
rows.name:
When I grow up, I wanna become
a Driver and visit Acedia too!
